main event: On October 23, 1949, an unidentified fireball was reported by members of a meteor society, appearing in the sky above Cincinnati, Ohio.
interesting points: The fireball was described as red in color and observed at a 45-degree altitude., The event was noted by several members of the meteor society who gathered observations., There were reports of similar fireball sightings in the surrounding area that month., The object was witnessed passing and vanishing towards the southeast., Attempts to track the fireball's movements provided limited concrete results, leading to further investigations.
witness description: Members of a meteor society who observed the fireball in flight.
